title: Clockwork Princess
description: Garret, a cruel and twisted Lord, has his eye on Sophia. After he forces Sophia's father into agreeing to a terrible deal, he does not keep his end of the bargain.Garret cannot resist taking Sophia for himself. And when he does, it has dire consequences for all involved.A tragic fairytale romance.Adult 18+
author: Bilinda Ni Siodacain
